short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select texts while browsing and convert them into notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This allows users to create notes or mark texts from the browser. If you visit a news website or wikipedia, you can select text and you can get a popup button 'Add Note'. On clicking it, the selected text will be marked as note. This works only with a paragraphs, and doesn't work in other types like title or list or form elements. And your selection has to be within a paragraph. You cannot select multiple paragraph to make note. So please be aware of this limitation.
